titles.title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide emergency loans to poultry producers to rebuild chicken houses destroyed by disasters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 2/14/2000--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide loans to qualifying poultry farmers to rebuild destroyed chicken houses.
